testcase.name: testBcryptDecryptShouldSupportLegacyKeyDerivationProcess
testcase.system-err: [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Plaintext: This is a plaintext message. The value can be obtained in the calling code by invoking 'cipher.getIV()'; [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Cipher text (91): 2432612431322455436f6c6832424e684e43364a3034442e73614c68754e69466953414c544b75ddca2970736361661b7df92d48064e69466949565e6931486b688a03a8e2f7e3529c88360d7e70d61e538abe2b17134e180da877 [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Creating Bcrypt hash with salt [584aa78f80cf8cf13c2f6e8502e70d8f] (16 bytes) [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Generated Bcrypt hash in 283 ms [main] WARN org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptor - Error decrypting content using Bcrypt-derived key; attempting legacy key derivation for backward compatibility [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Creating Bcrypt hash with salt [584aa78f80cf8cf13c2f6e8502e70d8f] (16 bytes) [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Generated Bcrypt hash in 282 ms [main] WARN org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.KeyDerivationBcryptSecureHasher - Using Legacy Key Derivation on bcrypt hash including cost and salt [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Plaintext (29): This is a plaintext message.

testcase.name: testScryptSaltShouldBe16Bytes
